name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience developing high-performance software solutions in healthcare and finance. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **AWS**, **Terraform**, **Git**, and **CI/CD** practices, leveraging tools like **CircleCI** for automated deployment. Skilled in testing frameworks such as **Jest** and **Vitest** for maintaining code quality. Adept in both **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, including **Postgres**, **DynamoDB**, and **Redis**, ensuring robust data management. Familiar with Agile methodologies including **Scrum** and **Kanban**, promoting efficient project execution. Strong expertise in **React** and **Python**, combined with experience in developing scalable applications using microservices and CI/CD automation.

In addition to technical proficiencies, brings hands-on experience in AI/ML system integration, with MLOps capabilities, managing ML pipelines and workflows utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. A proven leader in orchestrating complex enterprise projects that meet HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 compliance standards. Committed to creating impactful systems that not only perform optimally but also address real-world challenges.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable, full-stack solutions utilizing **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **React** (17–18), adhering to Agile methodologies including Kanban and Scrum for enhanced project management.
• Developed CI/CD pipelines with **CircleCI** and **Git**, ensuring seamless deployment and version control across multiple environments.
• Managed cloud infrastructure on **AWS** and integrated services using **Terraform** to facilitate efficient resource provisioning and management.
• Designed and maintained both SQL (using **Postgres** and **DynamoDB**) and NoSQL data architectures (**Redis**), optimizing for large-scale data processing and storage needs.
• Led the deployment of real-time applications focused on financial analysis and patient data management, utilizing **Python** and modern frameworks effectively to enhance user experience.
• Established rigorous testing strategies employing **Jest** and **Vitest**, ensuring robust quality assurance measures across all application layers.
• Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to integrate advanced data visualization tools such as **D3.js** and **Power BI**, delivering critical business insights from real-time data.
• Developed APIs for enhanced data accessibility, ensuring seamless integration of **AWS** services and enhancing performance across client-facing applications.
• Conducted thorough code reviews and maintained high coding standards, leveraging tools such as **GitHub** for collaboration and versioning.
• Utilized **Wireshark** for performance analysis and troubleshooting, ensuring the integrity and speed of application networks.

• Developed and maintained scalable web applications using **React (18)** and **TypeScript**, leveraging **Redux Toolkit** for state management and **Tailwind CSS** for enhanced UI responsiveness, resulting in a **30%** increase in user engagement.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **CircleCI** and **Terraform**, automating deployments across **AWS** environments and improving deployment efficiency by **40%**.
• Orchestrated data management strategies employing both **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, including **Postgres** and **DynamoDB**, optimizing data retrieval times by **25%**.
• Adopted **Agile** methodologies such as **Scrum** and **Kanban**, facilitating cross-functional collaboration and delivering project iterations in **two-week sprints**.
• Integrated unit testing frameworks like **Jest** and **Vitest** to ensure robust code quality and maintainability, achieving a **90%** code coverage across applications.
• Utilized **Python** for backend service development, with expertise in using **FastAPI** and **Django** to support transaction processing systems designed to handle over **1 million** transactions per day.
• Worked closely with cross-functional teams to implement robust logging and monitoring practices, leveraging tools like **Wireshark** for network traffic analysis and performance optimization.

Utilized **Typescript** for developing robust and high-performance applications, ensuring code quality through testing frameworks like **Jest** and **Vitest**.
Implemented **AWS** services for scalable cloud infrastructure, using **Terraform** for resource provisioning and management, resulting in a **30%** reduction in deployment time.
Developed CI/CD pipelines with **CircleCI**, enabling automated testing and deployment processes that improved release frequency by **40%**.
Designed and optimized backend APIs using **Python** with frameworks like FastAPI and Django, which enhanced application performance and reliability in handling up to **10,000** concurrent users.
Engineered real-time data handling features utilizing **Redis** for caching and support for high-volume workloads, boosting application response times by **50%**.
Collaborated in Agile methodologies with Kanban and Scrum practices, facilitating regular sprints and enhancing team productivity and communication.
Integrated various database technologies, including **Postgres** and **NoSQL** solutions like **DynamoDB** to ensure optimal data management across diverse application needs.
Contributed to the development of responsive user interfaces with **React** (version 18) while adhering to high accessibility standards and SEO best practices.
Worked on data security enhancements, employing role-based access control (RBAC) and OAuth 2.0 to secure application resources and user data integrity.
Engaged in effective version control and collaboration using **Git**, streamlining code management and team contributions.

skills:
